name: Boundless Storm
description: Manifest yourself as pure lightning, zapping nearby enemies with electricity dealing 231 Shock Damage every 1 second for 30 seconds.  While in this form you also gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948.  Activating this grants Major Expedition for a brief period, increasing your Movement Speed 30% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the duration, and you gain Major Expedition for brief period after activation, increasing your Movement Speed.

While in this form you also gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948.  Activating this grants Major Expedition for a brief period, increasing your Movement Speed 30% for 4 seconds.
